content: Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: There are many fun activities to do in New York City, including visiting popular attractions like the Empire State Building, Top of the Rock, Statue of Liberty, and Central Park. Other popular activities include taking city tours, walking tours, and visiting museums and theaters. There are also options for food tours, outdoor activities, nightlife, and day trips to nearby destinations. The text provides a comprehensive list of specific activities and attractions to explore in New York City, as well as reviews and opinions from Tripadvisor members. 
 
 Links: ['SPONSORED BY Visit Reno TahoeRedefine Your Family VacationSpend less time driving and more time making family memories on your summer trip to Reno Tahoe. We’ve mapped out a full itinerary of kid-friendly eateries and activities that are less than an hour away from downtown. With breathtaking beaches, exotic animals and amazing events on the agenda, we’ve made sure everyone’s needs are met…and hopefully, exceeded.View now (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Trips/122896833)', ' (https://www.tripadvisor.com/)', 'Review (https://www.tripadvisor.com/UserReview)', 'Trips (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Trips)', 'Alerts (https://www.tripadvisor.com/Inbox)']
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to the website, there are many fun activities to do in New York City, including visiting famous landmarks, museums, and galleries, taking boat tours, attending Broadway shows, exploring Central Park, trying different foods in various neighborhoods, going on a pub crawl, and visiting alternative museums such as ARTECHOUSE. Outdoor activities such as riding a jet ski along the Hudson River and cycling over the Brooklyn Bridge are also suggested. The website also recommends staying at mid-range chain hotels or renting an apartment in neighborhoods like Williamsburg, Bushwick, and Harlem, as well as exploring other destinations in the Northeastern U.S. that can be easily reached from New York City.
